mapper.insert: insert into board(content, m_idx, s_idx) values(#{content},#{m_idx},#{s_idx})
mapper.select: select member.userId, board.content, board.m_idx from member, board where member.m_idx=board.m_idx and board.s_idx=#{s_idx}
select count(board.content) from member, board where member.m_idx=board.m_idx and board.m_idx=${m_idx} and board.s_idx=#{s_idx}
